sections.heading: findings.The Legislature finds that it is in the public interest to:(1) Encourage customer-owned renewable energy resources;(2) Stimulate the economic growth of this state;(3) Encourage diversification of the energy resources used in this state; and(4) Maintain low-cost, reliable electric service

sections.text:
70-2001.Legislative findings.

The Legislature finds that it is in the public interest to:

(1) Encourage customer-owned renewable energy resources;

(2) Stimulate the economic growth of this state;

(3) Encourage diversification of the energy resources used in this state; and

(4) Maintain low-cost, reliable electric service.

SourceLaws 2009, LB436, ยง 1.
